revised_title: Vibration-Rotation Bands of Trideuteromethyl Iodide: Molecular Constants and Coriolis Coupling Coefficients
tldr: The authors analyzed the rotational fine structure of vibration bands of trideuteromethyl iodide and derived molecular constants, including band origins, rotational constants, and Coriolis coupling constants. Their findings provide a better understanding of the vibrational states and improve previous uncertainties about the Coriolis coefficients.
